Description: 0 false 18 pt 18 pt 0 0 false false false 2010 Epiphone SG Les Paul Custom Antique Ivory Gold Hard Case Youtube Videos This guitar has been rewired so that you can use any or all of the pickups in any combination! See the video descriptions and hear the sounds by clicking on the youtube links below! Triple pickups – excellent plus condition with only a few very small dings and some minor surface scratches. Zero fret wear. Original Epiphone pickups and gold hardware. It has three volume controls (one for each pickup) and a master tone control. The neck and bridge pickups function like a normal two pickup SG / Les Paul with a three-way switch: Neck volume, Bridge volume, but with one master tone control. The middle pickups has it’s own volume control and does not work off of the 3-way switch. So for normal two pickup operation, you would set the middle pickup volume to zero. Please see my Youtube videos for a demo of how the guitar looks, sounds, works. Includes the original Epiphone hard shell case with the key. The original output jack was replaced with a Switchcraft but it is not gold – the original gold output jack nut and washer are included. Weighs 8lbs, 5oz. Guitar Condition Overview: https://youtu.be/pBYsZuoeYIU Guitar Sound Demo: https://youtu.be/hRfSt9oarsM Please email with any questions. Shipping will be calculated. PayPal accepted. The item will ship when the checks clear. PayPal ships right away. Payment MUST BE RECEIVED within 7-10 DAYS of AUCTIONS END. Check my feedback and bid with confidence. Thank you for looking and good luck! The traditional way Gibson wires 3 pickups is with a 3 way switch that gives the follow options: Neck pup in the rhythm position, Middle and Bridge pups together in the middle position, and Bridge pup in the lead (treble) position. Here are the original specs from Epiphone: http://www.epiphone.com/Products/SG/G-400-Custom.aspx SPECIFICATIONS Body mahogany Neck mahogany, glued-in Scale 24.75” Neck Profile SlimTaper™ “D” Nut width 1.68 Fingerboard rosewood, 22 fret with vintage style SG Les Paul signature at end of fingerboard Fingerboard Radius 12” Trussrod cover Les Paul signature Pickups 3 Alnico Classic Plus™ humbucker Bridge Gold LockTone™ Tune-O-Matic Tailpiece Gold Stopbar Controls Neck pickup: 1-Volume, Bridge pickup: 1-Volume, Middle pickup: 1-Volume, 1-Master Tone w/full-size 500K O potentiometers Hardware Gold Tuners Gold Grover® 14:1 ratio Color Antique Ivory (AI)
